subject: Re: The Research Must Move Forward (it's a long post but important please read)
author: Frank
full_text:
Normally, I do not respond to such emails but a few things need to be
set straight just so the newer members don't think the comments that
have been made by Frank S, myself or anyone else are out of line. 

Bruce did leave on his own accord a couple months ago but only after
he was placed on probation and his posting rights taken away for being
nasty, belittling and insulting to several members. After many
warnings! He was let back in the group only after he privately emailed
the group owner, who through the kindness of her heart gave him
another chance.

Bruce has by his own words named himself the expert and in this own
words, "contributed more to box research than anyone else". He
repeatedly called himself the best in the world at it and so on. That
is why Sumption could make the tongue-in-cheek remarks he made. He was
only repeating what Bruce had actually stated. If you don't believe
me, do a search of the messages here and you will find it.

Apparently, Bruce also measures "serious researchers" by how much they
post or spout their drivel so lesser experienced experimenters will
look up to them as some leader. There is a point where helping someone
with a technique becomes guiding someone through the research. Let me
tell you, I have been in this research and other paranormal subject
for 15 years and I can promise you there are no experts despite what
TV will tell you. I will give my opinion and views if directly asked
but I will not interject my view and change yours just for name
recognition. It is best for you to take a little knowledge of a
technique and expand upon it in your own way. The method is not
important as the bond.

Now, you may hear from Bruce or a few people here will deliver this
response to him. He will say he is being talked about without the
opportunity to defend himself. I can't really help that because he
already unsubscribed. Well, those who would like to can paste his
response anytime you want (as long as its not offensive). Nothing that
I have said is untrue or libel. Anything described here can be looked
up in our past messages and many can elaborate their own take on what
has been said.

Regards,

Frank R.
